org.apache.reef.common

Class AbstractFailure

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.reef.common.AbstractFailure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Failure, Identifiable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FailedContextImpl, FailedJob, FailedRuntime, FailedTask

    public abstract class AbstractFailure
extends Object
implements Failure
    Common data and functionality for all error messages in REEF.
